metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26253 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Gluster GlusterFS 11.0, there is an xlators/mount/fuse/src/fuse-bridge.c notify stack-based buffer over-read.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-26253` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

glusterfs-cli - 10.3-5
glusterfs-client - 10.3-5
glusterfs-common - 10.3-5
glusterfs-server - 10.3-5
libgfapi0 - 10.3-5
libgfchangelog0 - 10.3-5
libgfrpc0 - 10.3-5
libgfxdr0 - 10.3-5
libglusterd0 - 10.3-5
libglusterfs0 - 10.3-5
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> stack-based overread is just a DoS on Ubuntu because of stack protector

criterions.comment: glusterfs package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.3-5').
